metadata.title: CVE-2017-11403 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The ReadMNGImage function in coders/png.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 has anout-of-order CloseBlob call, resulting in a use-after-free via a craftedfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11403` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.26-3
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.26-3
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.26-3
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.26-3
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.26-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.26-3').
